website_summaries.verdict: A versatile suit praised for design and comfort by triathletes and fitness enthusiasts alike.
pros: Sleeveless design provides excellent range of motion for swimming.Hydrodynamic neoprene construction, made with Yamamoto #39
Performs well for regular workouts and competition
Fits comfortably in tight areas and maintains body temperature even when exerting energy in extreme conditions
cons: Customers with long torsos should size up
A tad small in the chest

customer_reviews.title: Well made...but...
customer_reviews.text: Well...this seems to be a really nice wetsuit, nice & thick, & would probably keep me nice & warm in the Pacific ocean...but the largest size barely squoze over my hiney....I did manage to get it on, but the arm holes were really low cut & it felt like my boobs were going to squeeze out the sides....may not have been as much of an issue if it had fit a bit looser... I'm 5'9, 200lbs, measurements 41x37x47, 36/38B bra...got the WX, which was the largest size offered....so...guess not for me....hope this helps someone...
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Ann Barcellona

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the right price
customer_reviews.text: I have had several different wetsuits over the years, this by far is the best fitting and most comfortable one I have ever owned. The price was just right and the product has been perfect so far. I also like that the company is owned by fellow triathlon athletes, it gave me more confidence when I ordered that the product was going to be what the description said it was. As always be sure to check the size chart for yourself, don’t just go off of other reviews. I ordered according to the size chart and it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great first wetsuit for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and another Triathlon wetsuit to try out and loved this one. I've never swum in a wetsuit before and the tightness of the neck too some getting used to. This is easy on and off but fits tightly. It ran true to size, I'm 5'6" and 175 and the W3 fits perfectly. I've used it on two 40 minute swims and haven't had any chafing. I have a shorter torso, which is why the other suit I tried didn't work, so this one may run short especially in the larger sizes, but it works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: My wife, daughter and I all have these shorty wetsuits. They are flexible and designed like a more typical triathlon wetsuit rather than cheaper alternatives, which makes them better for open water swimming. We also use them for snorkeling, and they provide decent buoyancy and warmth, without being too hot. Without sleeves and full length legs, they are more packable for trips. As my daughter has grown, we continue to buy newer QuickJohns for her, as we've been happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Tri Geek

customer_reviews.title: Best sleeveless shortie
customer_reviews.text: I have swam with this shortie wetsuit for approximately 1 year in my coached Masters Swim program. It provides adequate warmth in the pool during winter months (pool is heated, but, outdoors). I rinse it after every use and it is holding up well. I swim 5 days/week and this particular SLEEVELESS wetsuit is perfect for swimmers
customer_reviews.author: secret beach kauai

customer_reviews.title: LOVED it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in desperation, at the very last minute, for a triathlon because I couldn't fit into the expensive suit I bought a few months ago. It was perfect! Great buoyancy and plenty warm enough even with the short legs. I was so comfortable in the water. Not only was my stroke unrestricted but my stance in the water allowed me to breath effortlessly. Last year I swam two open water races without a wetsuit and found them miserable because of the supreme effort required to even take a breath without inhaling half the ocean. This is a tremendous improvement and a cinch to get in and out of.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Bad for large Breasts
customer_reviews.text: The wetsuit is high quality and fits snuggly. If you have large breasts however (size D and up) you will have a hard time fitting in this suit no matter your weight. The suit cuts down closer to midclavicle in the front which is great for ROM on your stroke but not enough room to keep the 'girls' in 😀 Otherwise it's a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to using for my first triathlon
customer_reviews.text: I am new to open water swimming (and I am pretty terrible at it). This wet suit really made a difference. The suit kept me warm and buoyant which had me focusing less on my comfort and more on my technique. The first suit I bought needed returned because it was a bit too tight so if you are in between sizes, I recommend getting the size larger. It also came with a cute pink swimming cap which was a nice bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Jamielz

customer_reviews.title: Sizing was perfect, comfortable and easy to get on (and off!)
customer_reviews.text: I have a super tight and super heavy duty full wetsuit that I was afraid to try to wear for my first 70.3 in May. So I purchased this at the last minute. So glad I did, it was PERFECT. I plan to buy the full length sleeveless later this fall in the same size. I live in east TN, so don't really need super thick or super warm (lake doesn't get THAT cold here). I'm 5'0", about 130/34DD but a size 2 (gymnast build) and I got a P3. Happy swimming!
customer_reviews.author: DocKeebler

customer_reviews.title: So far I really like this wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this wetsuit. I purchased this for my first open water swim for a triathlon. I am 5'5 and 142 lbs and I ordered a size W2. I recently had a baby so an still carrying extra weight (especially around mid section) and was concerned I'd have trouble zipping it up but it really fits me great and will continue to even after I (hopefully) lose the last 10 lbs to get to pre pregnancy weight. It's really comfortable to swim in and keeps me warm when I'm out practicing in the lakes in Washington state during early summer.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Allemandi

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!! Thank You!
customer_reviews.text: I had just finished a triathalon over the weekend and wore my new Synergy Endorphins wetsuit and it is awesome! Highly highly recommend IF especially if you don't like how other wetsuits feel too tight around the neck like my other suit and the EASE of getting it off quickly in the transition area when you are off to do the bike leg of a race!! I also love that it is thigh length too! Easier to kick your feet in the water to propel because your feet are more submerged in the water! Love it! I am actually excited and less anxious to do the swim leg of my next Tri!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle A.

customer_reviews.title: This is a good Tri wetsuit for me
customer_reviews.text: This is a good Tri wetsuit for me. I'm 5'2" and 135 lbs. The suit is a bit of a job to get into but once I'm it it is comfortable - especially around the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Peony

customer_reviews.title: I received my order within two days which is awesome. This is my first swim skin and plan ...
customer_reviews.text: I received my order within two days which is awesome. This is my first swim skin and plan on using it for the military physical fitness test in a pool and Triathlons. Kind of weary of open water swimming but might try it out on a lake sprint tri. Haven't used it yet but the fit was great and pretty easy to get on. The neck was form fitting but not uncomfortable. I noticed it is not recommended for use in chlorinated water (pool). :( Hope it will hold up with the twice a year I will be using it in a pool.
customer_reviews.author: Hen

customer_reviews.title: VERY comfortable, flexible, sleek, and buoyant - LOVE it !
customer_reviews.text: I love this wet suit. I bought it based on other reviewers great comments, and I have to say they were right ! It is VERY comfortable and flexible....so easy to swim in. It gives plenty of buoyancy too. I tried several different wet suit combinations before purchasing this, including 2 other tri wet suits, 1 full, and one sleeveless full length. This one is so much better than anything else I tried. Everything else I tried was more constricting...either I felt like I couldn't breathe well, or it felt like it was holding me back/was not sleek enough, especially if I did any stroke other than crawl. I am 5 1.5, weight 128 and it is a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Suze

customer_reviews.title: Great suit for triathlons (Athenas take note!)
customer_reviews.text: I'm almost 5'7" and weigh around 185. This fits snug, but well. Worked great at my open water triathlon, and gives you enough motion to keep your usual swim stroke. I would highly recommend this for Tri use. Only complaint is that it is tight around the neck, but all wet suits are, so I'm not holding it against this one.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany C.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Had to buy a week before the race and I had never worn a wetsuit before. I was worried about sizing because all the wetsuits seem to run small. I'm 5'9" and 158 lbs and the W3 was a perfect fit. Comfortable, size chart was very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great suit!
customer_reviews.text: I love this suit. It's very well made, easy to put on and take off. Has just the right amount of bouyancy yet is easy to swim in too.
customer_reviews.author: boo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic suit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help be more competitive in open water swim competitions. I was so pleased with the fit and the overall comfort in the water. Perfect balance of fit and buoyancy, made a huge impact on my strokes. I ordered the WX and it was just right for 5'9" 205lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Holly C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome suit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my first triathalon. Awesome fit, quality, all around perfect. Highly recommended. Arrived right on time as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Glenna Ford

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a wetsuit for swimming in a small lake in Washington and decided on the Farmer John style because it looked like it would be easier to fit as I have a short torso and long arms and legs. I got the W2 size which fit perfectly; I'm 5'7" and about 145 lbs. It's easy to get on and off and keeps me plenty warm once I get going. I've used it all summer and it wasn't too warm when the water increased in temperature and is again comfortable now that we are quickly heading into cooler weather. I've never had a wetsuit before and this one seems very durable and is comfortable. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was a good suit, but it didn't fit me
customer_reviews.text: It was a good suit, but it didn't fit me....i am short and stocky (5'4" and 155 lbs) it was too small so I returned it. I decided to try a different one so I did not get the W2 to try. I was afraid it would be too tall. Most of these are designed for taller people and I got frustrated returning suits.
customer_reviews.author: hartleeb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent wetsuit. Well worth the cost. I used it for a mini triathlon and it was easy to get out of to transition to the bike. Great quality. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Schlemmer

customer_reviews.title: This is definitely my favorite. Highlights
customer_reviews.text: I tried the zoot suit and full leg version of the Synergy suit. This is definitely my favorite. Highlights: very high quality; easy on/off; comfortable around neck and legs. I also think this offers more mobility for different types of swim strokes, which I greatly appreciate since I tend to do the breast stroke more than the front crawl.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable! Not tight in the neck like my full ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! Not tight in the neck like my full wetsuit by XTERRA. Was easy to get on. Tried W2 and W3 since I was in between sizes but stayed with the W3 because chest was tight with W2 (Im 36 DD in chest) 5 41/2 148 lb. Easy to get off as well. What a deal!
customer_reviews.author: KMidcap

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit for triathlon!
customer_reviews.text: Upgrading my first tri wetsuit to something more comfortable. This one is great! The neck is a softer, thinner neoprene so I don’t get that strangled feeling like I do with every other wetsuit. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Longhurst

customer_reviews.title: best value for your money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wetsuit for warmer days when you still want that extra floatation and speed. You cannot get better value for your money! I do open water swims with a group of 20-30; at least 7 of us have these now.
customer_reviews.author: LED

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, comfortable and the customer service of the seller was really good. The suit fits small so you may want to order one size up.
customer_reviews.author: MDM

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and buoyant
customer_reviews.text: Soft, light, comfortable and buoyant! I love it. Used it 3 times already. Looks as new as first time.
customer_reviews.author: pooneh

customer_reviews.title: Really like the suit but even though I ordered the right ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like the suit but even though I ordered the right size W-2 for my height 5'11" and weight 134 it is too big around the arm hole. I am small busted and not sure if this adds to the problem. I had hope to get it for a TRI 2 weeks ago, but I ordered too late, so did not try it on until now. I will be returning. I am not sure if the next size down would work for my height.
customer_reviews.author: Twyla Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit! Arms don't feel constrained while swimming
customer_reviews.text: Great wetsuit! Arms don't feel constrained while swimming. Sometimes it's a bit uncomfortable in the neck area when I first put it on, but it does not bother me at all while swimming. I am about 5'1", 115, and a P2 works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Mangin

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. I've only worn it twice in the sea and swam a mile. Felt like a great fit. second swim i noticed a bit of rubbing round neck, unlike first swim. Maybe be because I put suit on in a rush and may ned to pull up a little higher.
customer_reviews.author: E Wynne-Jones

customer_reviews.title: Slick Suit
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it - great for swimming laps and pool exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Originally I was disappointed because the wrong size came
customer_reviews.text: Originally I was disappointed because the wrong size came. An employee called me and offered to replace it with a more expensive suit. This helped me to feel better about my order and the helpfulness of the employee.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: so this seems like a good choice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because of the description on Amazon. I have both long sleeve & short sleeve wetsuits & was looking for something less cumbersome, so this seems like a good choice
customer_reviews.author: CAB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect suit for Texas Summer lake/ocean training!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price. It's the perfect starter suit for anyone who hasn't swam in a wetsuit before. I live in Houston, Texas and I've been swimming in the lake in the summer heat but have not felt too hot in it.
customer_reviews.author: Maneli

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, easy to get out of in transition area ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, easy to get out of in transition area from swim to bike in a triathlon competition, great if water temperature high enough that full wet suit not needed.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for tri's and bodysurfing.
customer_reviews.text: Great wetsuit for open water swims and Bodysurfing!!! It really glides and gives just enough floatation for wave riding. Love this suit!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Fair

customer_reviews.title: ... suit seems to be very well made and fits comfortably. I've only used it once so far to ...
customer_reviews.text: This suit seems to be very well made and fits comfortably. I've only used it once so far to try it out, but I am looking forward to trying it on my first Tri. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Mikka

customer_reviews.title: Quality Wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of wetsuit Neck is not restricted Worth the investment Included pink swim cap ... nice bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on / take off
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wetsuit. Fit really well. Great quality and served the purpose. I didn’t feel cold swimming. Easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Tri-Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great suit! I would have given it 5 stars ...
customer_reviews.text: Great suit! I would have given it 5 stars except the neck needs to be trimmed, it's a bit bulky. Otherwise it rocks.
customer_reviews.author: steff

customer_reviews.title: easy to get on
customer_reviews.text: True to size, easy to get on, and it was easier to swim in that my other tri wet suit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it worked great!
customer_reviews.text: My first wetsuit, so I don't have much of a reference point of comparison, but it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Peyton

customer_reviews.title: T/G it fits!
customer_reviews.text: Third attempt at a wetsuit. Very helpful website for sizing. Only one that suggesting adjusting the size based on a long body.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Palermo

customer_reviews.title: loved it for open water river swim
customer_reviews.text: First wetsuit that didn't give me the neck chafe. it looks short but provided all the flotation that my full sleeve/leg wetsuit does. loved it for open water river swim.
customer_reviews.author: Avocadoadmirer

customer_reviews.title: Fits great; I've tried it out twice now
customer_reviews.text: Fits great; I've tried it out twice now, got some chafing under the arms but I think that will resolve. Plan to try some body glide to prevent it. Love the suit!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila A.

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and easy to get on
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and easy to get on. I absolutely love it, and can't wait for my first open water swim.
customer_reviews.author: julie tettmar

customer_reviews.title: i absolutely love this wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: i absolutely love this wetsuit. the fit is perfect. i have yet to try it out in the water but it's great on land! size chart is very accurate if you follow the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: shannon s.

customer_reviews.title: Wetsuit fit great and was true to size
customer_reviews.text: Wetsuit fit great and was true to size. The neck is a tiny bit uncomfortable but overall a great wetsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie N

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a great fit and comfortable. I do wish the back neck area was a little lower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the wet suit especially the neck it's not constricting. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great suit and good quality. Easy to get in and out of.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Very comfortable to swim in and the fit was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Ramos

customer_reviews.title: will try it out at a race the Great Chesapeake Bay Swim this weekend
customer_reviews.text: fits well. will try it out at a race the Great Chesapeake Bay Swim this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: lynn mcateer

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great wetsuit! It is comfortable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, fit was true to sizing chart on manufacturer's website. Great flexibility, quick on and off, very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Katie H.

customer_reviews.title: I have done only one open swim in it so far but felt comfortable with it on and it was also quite buoyant
customer_reviews.text: Bought this wetsuit for my first triathlon this summer. I have done only one open swim in it so far but felt comfortable with it on and it was also quite buoyant. I am 5'1 and about 110 lbs and the P2 fit me well. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sitamama

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wetsuit. It's fitting me very well and awesome quality.
customer_reviews.author: AAA

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to get into the wetsuit. A little tight around the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed using this wetsuit. I did my first triathlon yesterday. It was a great fit!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Top quality product and service.
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with the the wetsuit, and the service was excellent, very efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous suit! Doesn't choke you as others do. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Maresa Madsen

customer_reviews.title: New favorite wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable wetsuit. Easy on and off. Velcro is very strong -- takes a strong hand to unfasten. Swam well, seemed buoyant. True to size chart.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne L Lappin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Wetsuit. Fits perfect around the neck
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful Wetsuit. Fits perfect around the neck. Does not choke. Customer Service is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for open water swiming and TRI events
customer_reviews.text: The order arrived within a few days of ordering. I'm 5'5", 132 lbs., ordered the Women's size W1, and the suit fit as expected. I am able to swim freely without any constriction, and my body temperature remains constant, (neither too hot or too cold). I can slip it on and off quickly, which is important in TRI events. I haven't had it long enough to comment on how it holds up over time with repeated use.
customer_reviews.author: Mitten State

customer_reviews.title: The fit is nice (i actually borrowed a friends that was slightly too ...
customer_reviews.text: I got mostly for sprint tri and training, though even in my area the water was warm enough to go sans wetsuits. The fit is nice (i actually borrowed a friends that was slightly too big at first to try) i ended up really liking it. I like the sleeveless and short wetsuits. and this was the only one that fit the bill for me. enough buoyancy to help, and also cut down on my time. true to fit. not too tight or loose for me.
customer_reviews.author: medic k

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, range of motion in shoulders, warm
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small wet suit for a swim-run race in which wetsuits are required. This suit is comfortable, easy to get on/off, and provides surprising warmth. It's snug in the neckline (prevents water entry) so Vaseline or anti-chafe is needed to avoid rubbing with sighting. Great range of motion through the shoulders. I appreciate the good fit of the W1 size. I'm 5'7" and 135, skinny build with big shoulders. Very pleased, even bought one for a friend!
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I love this wetsuit!!! Very comfortable and pretty easy to put on and take off...If you are at the higher end of the weight chart size, you might want to go up to the next size.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Wickham

customer_reviews.title: ... suit based on the size chart and it fit perfect. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the suit based on the size chart and it fit perfect. Very happy with my purchase. Have worn only a few times but so far holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Means I can swim outside for longer into the winter, perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Allergic to Neoprene
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I found out I am allergic to neoprene and broke out is a really bad skin rash.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Kruse

product_meta.title: Synergy Triathlon Wetsuit - Women's Endorphin Sleeveless Quick John Smoothskin Neoprene for Open Water Swimming Ironman & USAT Approved
feature_bullets: SUITABLE FOR ALL LEVELS – Ironman & USAT approved. Athlete endorsed. Comes in wide range of sizes to ensure a perfect fit.
PROVEN TECHNOLOGY EQUALS SUPERIOR PERFORMANCE – Hydrodynamic neoprene made from Yamamoto #39 with SCS silicone coated SyPrene. 5mm thick core buoyancy panel / 3mm legs and back.

EXCEPTIONAL FUNCTIONALITY – Full range of motion. Unsurpassed 680 percent flexibility. Highest grade anti corrode internal wetsuit zipper from YKK which greatly reduces drag as you move through the water. Super soft low neck with smoothskin on both sides and because it is so soft, it feels like you hardly have anything around your neck.

MAXIMUM BUOYANCY - 5mm wetsuit, which is the maximum buoyancy allowed in triathlon wetsuits. Creates nearly double the buoyancy than 3mm suits, which are not recommended for cold waters. Float higher. Move faster. Save energy.

CUSTOMER SATISFACTION - 30-Day Guarantee: If you are not 100% satisfied within 30-days, send your new/unused wetsuit back for a full refund / 2 Year Warranty / Lifetime Replacement Guarantee (allows end-user to send in their used wetsuit at any time and receive 40% off MSRP).
